title: Jubilee Jamboree
brief_description: A record of the International Boy Scouts Jamboree held at Sutton Park, near Birmingham in August 1957 to celebrate 50 years of scouting and the centenary of the birth of the founder, Lord Baden Powell. 35,000 scouts attending representing 85 different countries.
